mapper.select: SELECT DEAL_SQ AS dealSq ,WORK_SQ AS workSq ,SELL_MBR_SQ AS sellMbrSq ,BUY_MBR_SQ AS buyMbrSq ,ARTST_SQ AS artstSq FROM TBL_DA_WORK_DEAL_H WHERE DEAL_SQ = #{dealSq}

SELECT DEAL_SQ AS dealSq ,(SELECT WORK_NM FROM TBL_DA_WORK_M WHERE WORK_SQ = TBL.WORK_SQ) AS workSq ,ARTST_SQ AS artstSq ,(SELECT CONCAT(B.MBR_NM,'[',A.ARTST_ACTVTY_NM,']') FROM TBL_DA_ARTST_M A INNER JOIN TBL_DA_MBR_M B ON A.MBR_SQ = B.MBR_SQ WHERE A.ARTST_SQ = TBL.ARTST_SQ) AS artstSqNm ,MBR_REF_NO AS mbrRefNo ,(SELECT B.DTL_CD_NM FROM TBL_DA_COMN_CD_M A INNER JOIN TBL_DA_COMN_DTL_CD_S B ON A.CD_SQ = B.CD_SQ WHERE A.CD = 'DEAL_TYP_CD' AND B.DTL_CD = TBL.DEAL_TYP_CD AND A.USE_YN = 'Y') AS dealTypCd ,(SELECT B.DTL_CD_NM FROM TBL_DA_COMN_CD_M A INNER JOIN TBL_DA_COMN_DTL_CD_S B ON A.CD_SQ = B.CD_SQ WHERE A.CD = 'DEAL_STTS_CD' AND B.DTL_CD = TBL.DEAL_STTS_CD AND A.USE_YN = 'Y') AS dealTypCdTxt ,FORMAT(DEAL_STRT_PRC,0) AS dealStrtPrc ,DEAL_AUCTN_PRC AS dealAuctnPrc ,DEAL_FINAL_PRC AS dealFinalPrc ,DATE_FORMAT(DEAL_STRT_DT, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i') AS dealStrtDt ,DATE_FORMAT(DEAL_ENDNG_DT, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i') AS dealEndngDt ,WORK_SQ AS workSqNum ,DEAL_MEMO AS dealMemo ,SELL_MBR_SQ AS sellMbrSq ,BUY_MBR_SQ AS buyMbrSq ,DEAL_STTS_CD AS dealSttsCd ,BUY_PAYMNT_STTS_CD AS buyPaymntSttsCd ,SELL_PAYMNT_STTS_CD as sellPaymntSttsCd FROM TBL_DA_DEAL_M TBL WHERE 1=1
AND DEAL_SQ = #{dealSq}

SELECT PAYMNT_SQ as paymntSq , PAYMNT_TYP_CD as paymntTypCd ,(SELECT B.DTL_CD_NM FROM TBL_DA_COMN_CD_M A INNER JOIN TBL_DA_COMN_DTL_CD_S B ON A.CD_SQ = B.CD_SQ WHERE A.CD = 'PAYMNT_TYP_CD' AND B.DTL_CD = PH.PAYMNT_TYP_CD AND A.USE_YN = 'Y') AS paymntTypCdNm , MBR_SQ as mbrSq , DEAL_SQ as dealSq , DEAL_TYP_CD as dealTypCd ,(SELECT B.DTL_CD_NM FROM TBL_DA_COMN_CD_M A INNER JOIN TBL_DA_COMN_DTL_CD_S B ON A.CD_SQ = B.CD_SQ WHERE A.CD = 'DEAL_TYP_CD' AND B.DTL_CD = PH.DEAL_TYP_CD AND A.USE_YN = 'Y') AS dealTypCdNm , WORK_SQ as workSq , ARTST_SQ as artstSq , CUPON_SQ as cuponSq , PAYMNT_DIV_CD as paymntDivCd ,(SELECT B.DTL_CD_NM FROM TBL_DA_COMN_CD_M A INNER JOIN TBL_DA_COMN_DTL_CD_S B ON A.CD_SQ = B.CD_SQ WHERE A.CD = 'PAYMNT_DIV_CD' AND B.DTL_CD = PH.PAYMNT_DIV_CD AND A.USE_YN = 'Y') AS paymntDivCdNm , PAYMNT_AMT as paymntAmt , PAYMNT_FEE_AMT as paymnt_feeAmt , PAYMNT_DISC_AMT as paymntDiscAmt , AMOUNT as amount , MBR_REF_NO as mbrRefNo , REF_NO as refNo , AUTH_TOKEN as authToken , AID as aid , GOODS_NAME as goodsName , PAYMETHOD as paymethod , TRAN_DATE as tranDate , TRAN_TIME as tranTime , APPL_NO as applNo , CARD_NO as cardNo , INSTALLMENT as installment , PAY_TYPE as payType , ISSUE_COMPANY_NO as issueCompanyNo , ISSUE_COMPANY_NAME as issueCompanyName , ISSUE_CARD_NAME as issueCardName , ACQ_COMPANY_NO as acqCompanyNo , ACQ_COMPANY_NAME as acqCompanyName , BANK_CODE as bankCode , ACCOUNT_NO as accountNo , ACCOUNT_CLOSE_DATE as accountCloseDate , TAX_AMOUNT as taxAmount , FEE_AMOUNT as feeAmount , FORMAT(TAX_FREE_AMOUNT,0) as taxFreeAmount ,A.PAYMNT_DT AS paymntDt FROM TBL_DA_PAYMNT_H PH WHERE 1=1 AND PH.DEAL_SQ = #{dealSq}

SELECT DEAL_SQ AS dealSq ,SELL_MBR_SQ AS sellMbrSq ,BUY_MBR_SQ AS buyMbrSq ,ARTST_SQ AS artstSq ,TRNSPRT_DIV_CD AS trnsprtDivCd ,TRNSPRT_TYP_CD AS trnsprtTypCd ,TRNSPRT_AREA_CD AS trnsprtAreaCd ,TRNSPRT_SERVICE_CD AS trnsprtServiceCd ,TRNSPRT_PRC AS trnsprtPrc FROM TBL_DA_DEAL_TRNSPRT_S A WHERE 1=1 AND A.DEAL_SQ = #{dealSq} ORDER BY DEAL_SQ DESC

SELECT WORK_SQ AS workSq ,WORK_MAIN_IMG_URL AS workMainImgUrl ,WORK_NM AS workNm ,WORK_PRODC_YEAR AS workProdcYear ,WORK_PRC AS workPrc FROM TBL_DA_WORK_M WHERE 1=1 AND DEL_YN = 'N' /*작품 삭제 여부 확인 */ AND WORK_SQ = #{workSq}
